alphaChanges:
Please uninstall ChromebookGUI, then reinstall the new version. This is a known issue and will be worked on.
- Added changelogs for new updates
- Fixed #12 (notes displaying improperly)
- Fixed invalid emails displaying an empty grid
- Fixed crashing when searching by user/query string and that user only has one enrolled device
- Refactored a lot of the code
- After you get a device result from the Omnibar, you'll see the user for the device.
- Most of the time, the current user will show up in the "Change User" box.
